SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.model.services

Class RecipeService

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.model.services.RecipeService
@Service public class RecipeService extends Object

Class for handling business logic for Recipe objects.

The class will handle the following CRUD operations:
  • Find by id
  • Find all
  • Save
  • Delete by id
The recipeRepository is autowired into the class to handle the CRUD operations.

Any exceptions that occur during the CRUD operations will be caught and rethrown as a ServiceException.

    • saveObjectToDatabase

      public Recipe saveObjectToDatabase(Recipe entity)
      Method for saving a Recipe object The recipe object is saved to the database. If the recipe object contains ingredients that does not exist in the ingredient database, the ingredients are saved to the database before the recipe is saved. Exceptions are caught and rethrown as a ServiceException. PS Litt overkill å lagre ingredienser som ikke eksisterer i databasen, siden man ikke har noen funksjonalitet for å legge til nye ingredienser mens man lager en oppskrift, men mulig å implementere i fremtiden + det tok dritlang tid å få til å funke så jeg nekter å fjerne det.
      Parameters:
      entity - the Recipe object to be saved

    • updateObjectInDatabase
